00033 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00035 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00036 template <unsigned int N, class Real>
00037 class SpTuple
00038 {
00039 
00041 public:
00042 
00043     SpTuple ();
00044     SpTuple (Real fValue);
00045     SpTuple (const Real* afSpTuple, unsigned int uiN = N);
00046     SpTuple (const SpTuple& rkV);
00047 
00049 public:
00050 
00051     const Real* values() const;
00052     Real* values();
00053     Real operator[] (unsigned int i) const;
00054     Real& operator[] (unsigned int i);
00055 
00057 public:
00058 
00059     SpTuple& operator= (const SpTuple& rkV);
00060 
00062 public:
00063 
00064     bool operator== (const SpTuple& rkV) const;
00065     bool operator!= (const SpTuple& rkV) const;
00066     bool operator<  (const SpTuple& rkV) const;
00067     bool operator<= (const SpTuple& rkV) const;
00068     bool operator>  (const SpTuple& rkV) const;
00069     bool operator>= (const SpTuple& rkV) const;
00070 
00072 public:
00073 
00074     SpTuple operator+ (const SpTuple& rkV) const;
00075     SpTuple operator- (const SpTuple& rkV) const;
00076     SpTuple operator+ (Real fScalar) const;
00077     SpTuple operator- (Real fScalar) const;
00078     SpTuple operator* (Real fScalar) const;
00079     SpTuple operator/ (Real fScalar) const;
00080     SpTuple operator- () const;
00081 
00082 // Updates:
00083 public:
00084 
00085     SpTuple& operator+= (const SpTuple& rkV);
00086     SpTuple& operator-= (const SpTuple& rkV);
00087     SpTuple& operator+= (Real fScalar);
00088     SpTuple& operator-= (Real fScalar);
00089     SpTuple& operator*= (Real fScalar);
00090     SpTuple& operator/= (Real fScalar);
00091 
00093 protected:
00094 
00095     int compare(const SpTuple& rkV) const;
00096 
00098 protected:
00099 
00100     Real m_afValues[N];
00101 };
00102 
00103 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00105 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00106 template< class Real >
00107 class SpTuple2 : public SpTuple<2, Real>
00108 {
00109 
00111 public:
00112 
00113     SpTuple2 (const SpTuple<2, Real>& rkV)
00114     : SpTuple<2, Real>( rkV ){ return; }
00115 
00116     SpTuple2(Real fX = 0, Real fY = 0)
00117     { x() = fX; y() = fY; }
00118 
00120 public:
00121 
00122     Real x() const { return m_afValues[0]; }
00123     Real& x() { return m_afValues[0]; }
00124     Real y() const { return m_afValues[1]; }
00125     Real& y() { return m_afValues[1]; }
00126 
00128 public:
00129 
00130     Real s() const { return m_afValues[0]; }
00131     Real& s() { return m_afValues[0]; }
00132     Real t() const { return m_afValues[1]; }
00133     Real& t() { return m_afValues[1]; }
00134 
00135 };

00140 template< class Real>
00141 class SpTuple3 : public SpTuple<3, Real>
00142 {
00143 
00145 public:
00146 
00147     SpTuple3 (const SpTuple<3, Real>& rkV)
00148         : SpTuple<3, Real>( rkV ){ return; }
00149 
00150     SpTuple3(Real fX = 0, Real fY = 0, Real fZ = 0)
00151     { x() = fX; y() = fY; z() = fZ; }
00152 
00154 public:
00155 
00156     Real x() const { return m_afValues[0]; }
00157     Real& x() { return m_afValues[0]; }
00158     Real y() const { return m_afValues[1]; }
00159     Real& y() { return m_afValues[1]; }
00160     Real z() const { return m_afValues[2]; }
00161     Real& z() { return m_afValues[2]; }
00162 
00164 public:
00165 
00166     Real r() const { return m_afValues[0]; }
00167     Real& r() { return m_afValues[0]; }
00168     Real g() const { return m_afValues[1]; }
00169     Real& g() { return m_afValues[1]; }
00170     Real b() const { return m_afValues[2]; }
00171     Real& b() { return m_afValues[2]; }
00172 
00174 public:
00175 
00176     Real s() const { return m_afValues[0]; }
00177     Real& s() { return m_afValues[0]; }
00178     Real t() const { return m_afValues[1]; }
00179     Real& t() { return m_afValues[1]; }
00180     Real p() const { return m_afValues[2]; }
00181     Real& p() { return m_afValues[2]; }
00182 };

00187 template< class Real>
00188 class SpTuple4 : public SpTuple<4, Real>
00189 {
00190 
00192 public:
00193 
00194     SpTuple4 (const SpTuple<4, Real>& rkV)
00195         : SpTuple<4, Real>( rkV ){ return; }
00196 
00197     SpTuple4(Real fX = 0, Real fY = 0, Real fZ = 0, Real fW = 1)
00198     { x() = fX; y() = fY; z() = fZ; w() = fW; }
00199 
00201 public:
00202 
00203     Real x() const { return m_afValues[0]; }
00204     Real& x() { return m_afValues[0]; }
00205     Real y() const { return m_afValues[1]; }
00206     Real& y() { return m_afValues[1]; }
00207     Real z() const { return m_afValues[2]; }
00208     Real& z() { return m_afValues[2]; }
00209     Real w() const { return m_afValues[3]; }
00210     Real& w() { return m_afValues[3]; }
00211 
00213 public:
00214 
00215     Real r() const { return m_afValues[0]; }
00216     Real& r() { return m_afValues[0]; }
00217     Real g() const { return m_afValues[1]; }
00218     Real& g() { return m_afValues[1]; }
00219     Real b() const { return m_afValues[2]; }
00220     Real& b() { return m_afValues[2]; }
00221     Real a() const { return m_afValues[3]; }
00222     Real& a() { return m_afValues[3]; }
00223 
00225 public:
00226 
00227     Real s() const { return m_afValues[0]; }
00228     Real& s() { return m_afValues[0]; }
00229     Real t() const { return m_afValues[1]; }
00230     Real& t() { return m_afValues[1]; }
00231     Real p() const { return m_afValues[2]; }
00232     Real& p() { return m_afValues[2]; }
00233     Real q() const { return m_afValues[3]; }
00234     Real& q() { return m_afValues[3]; }
00235 };

00256

00258 SpTuple<N,Real> Offset(const SpTuple<N,Real>& rkV, Real fOffset);
